long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A web extension with just a few simple buttons. These straightforward controls manage one of the most advanced and state-of-the-art AI tools available today. 

Any text you select or start writing can be generated or smartly enhanced with just a click or two, saving you a ton of time. It's very easy to use.

With Rewright, everyone can effectively use ChatGPT.
